extensionDescription.message: This Add-on works by blocking the operation of JavaScript in your browser, you can also block elements of the page, see the blocked elements and unblock them.

works.message: This Add-on works by blocking the operation of JavaScript in your browser, you can also block elements of the page.The recommended is not to enable JavaScript for all pages.This Add-on launches the tab with JavaScript enabled, because some pages may not load correctly. The recommended is to disable JavaScript as soon as possible on the page by clicking the Add-on icon, the preference will be saved for the next visit.

resources.message: The Add-on currently has the following features:

resources1.message: 1. Block Ads with the Block Element option

resources3.message: 3. See the Blocked Elements in the page

note.message: Note: This Add-on is completely free! Please consider make a small donation or write an review at addons.mozilla.org. Thank you!

bugs.message: If you find any bugs, have any suggestions or some ideas for this add-on: Please create a new issue.

blockElementFromThePage.message: Block the element from the page ?

description_contextmenu.message: Allow or not the Context menu
